title: Father and Son Song
medium: heliorelief and woodcut on hot-pressed T.H. Saunders paper, with painted oak and gum plywood frame and assemblage
dimensions: overall (with frame): 217.8 x 192.1 x 10.8 cm (85 3/4 x 75 5/8 x 4 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Graphicstudio/University of South Florida and the Artist in Honor of the 50th Anniversary of the National Gallery of Art
